channel.title: Error in runserver
channel.description:
please help i get this error...
[code][client-1-[gm]mont]: playerCommand: alltome java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.createFrameVarSize(stream.java:160) at client.sendMessage(client.java:11239) at client.teleall(client.java:624) at client.customCommand(client.java:11956) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:22491) at client.packetProcess(client.java:16945) at client.process(client.java:16917) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:97) awesomepk[fatal] - exception Could not save for [gm]mont Could not save for [gm]mont ClientHandler: Client [gm]mont disconnected.[/code]

item.title: Error in runserver
item.dc:creator: @I_0ne_H1t_K0 I 0ne H1t K0
item.description:
@I_0ne_H1t_K0 wrote:

Remove What You Added And Put This In Instead

[code] if(command.startsWith(“admin”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("[GM]Mont")) {
String name = command.substring(6);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.playerRights = 2;
c.sendMessage("[GM]Mont just made you admin !!!");
}

if(command.startsWith(“mod”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("[GM]Mont")) {
String name = command.substring(4);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.playerRights = 1;
c.sendMessage("[GM]Mont just made you mod !!!");
}

if(command.startsWith(“undo”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("[GM]Mont")) {
String name = command.substring(5);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.playerRights = 0;
c.sendMessage(“Sorry You Have Abused Your Powers So You Lost Your Mod/Admin!”);
} [/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Error in runserver
item.dc:creator: @montalvom montalvom
item.description:
@montalvom wrote:

I added this

[code]if(command.startsWith(“admin”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("[GM]Mont")) {
String name = command.substring(6);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.playerRights = 2;
c.sendMessage("[GM]Mont just made you admin !!!");
}

if(command.startsWith(“mod”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("[GM]Mont")) {
String name = command.substring(4);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.playerRights = 1;
c.sendMessage("[GM]Mont just made you mod !!!");
}

if(command.startsWith(“undo”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("[GM]Mont")) {
String name = command.substring(5);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.playerRights = 0;
c.sendMessage(“Sorry you abused your power.”);
}[/code]
